@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A multi-purpose widget, which combines a label with an icon. The intended purpose of qx.ui.basic.Atom is to easily align the common icon-text combination in different ways. This is useful for all types of buttons, tooltips, â€¦ Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

   var atom = new qx.ui.basic.Atom("Icon Right", "icon/32/actions/go-next.png");
   this.getRoot().add(atom);

This example creates an atom with the label "Icon Right" and an icon. External Documentation Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: label {qx.ui.basic.Label} label part of the atom

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: icon {qx.ui.basic.Image} icon part of the atom

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The label/caption/text of the qx.ui.basic.Atom instance

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Switches between rich HTML and text content. The text mode (false) supports advanced features like ellipsis when the available space is not enough. HTML mode (true) supports multi-line content and all the markup features of HTML content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Any URI String supported by qx.ui.basic.Image to display an icon

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The space between the icon and the label

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Configure the visibility of the sub elements/widgets. Possible values: both, label, icon

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The position of the icon in relation to the text. Only useful/needed if text and icon is configured and 'show' is configured as 'both' (default)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the content should be rendered centrally when to much space is available. Enabling this property centers in both axis. The behavior when disabled of the centering depends on the {@link #iconPosition} property. If the icon position is left or right, the X axis is not centered, only the Y axis. If the icon position is top or bottom, the Y axis is not centered. In case of e.g. an icon position of top-left no axis is centered.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the visibility of the label

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the visibility of the icon

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mark the message for translation but return the original message.
